long: Meaning: "safe", i.e. (figuratively) "well", "happy", "friendly"; also (abstractly) "welfare", i.e. health, prosperity, peace.  Usage: × do, familiar, × fare, favour,   friend, × great, (good) health, (× perfect, such as be at) peace(-able, -ably), prosper(-ity, -ous), rest, safe(-ty), salute, welfare, (× all is, be) well, × wholly.  Source: or "שָׁלֹם"; from "H7999";
